特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
関連科目: カナダ研究入門A、カナダ研究入門B、Topics in Canadian Studies、English for Cross-Cultural Studies A,B(level 3)（担当：矢頭）、Cross-Cultural College Global Career Seminar、カナダの協定校での中期留学、交換留学及びマウント・アリソン大学とのダブル・ディグリーなど
授業の概要・背景: This course is recommended to students who wish to study in Canada.
授業方法:
Classes will be conducted in the classroom unless designated otherwise due to unexpected circumstances.
Students should read the assigned reading material before coming to class. The instructor will give a lecture on a certain topic, followed by questions and answers. Students are required to write a topical essay to be completed in each class or at home, and submit a term-end essay at the end of the course.

第1回: Course introduction and Explanation of course requirements and assignments
第2回:
Toronto - a dynamic multicultural city
Montreal - a linguistically complex city in the French-speaking province of Quebec
第3回: The Maritime Provinces -　Newfoundland and Labrador, Nova Scotia, New Brunswick and Prince Edward Island
第4回: The Prairies and the West - Manitoba, Saskatchewan, Alberta and British Columbia
第6回: Official Bilingualism - Canada's language policy at the national level
第7回: Life and Politics of Justin Trudeau, the Prime Minister of Canada
第13回: The Indigenous Peoples of Canada and current issues
